ygData.subject: Re: Some thought on the fishing pole
ygData.msgSnippet: i dont think thats for the pole at all. Why would it say anything about vision if it was. That might be for glasses of some sort or something. I ve never even
ygData.messageBody:
i dont think thats for the pole at all. Why would it say anything about
vision if it was. That might be for glasses of some sort or something. I've
never even tinkered (im not even a gnome :), but "vision" has nothing to do
with fishing poles.
-----Original Message-----
From: makaspro@... <makaspro@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, September 02, 1999 9:04 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Some thought on the fishing pole


>From: makaspro@...
>
>During the beta, the developer for the trade skils said that
>for Tinkering it was VERY IMPORTANT to read between the lines
>in the Journals of Gimblestan. If that's a given lets look
>at the description of the Spyglass.
>
>"...The extra Metal Rod gives it a good shell while the bottle and
>metal twine hold and amplify the vision..."
>
>I've taken this to mean that because it says extra the collapsable
>pole must have at least 1 metal rod. I'm also assuming since it
>doesn't say extra or additional on the metal twine or bottle that
>they probably aren't a component.
>
>Of course I may be way off base. As soon as I have more money
>to experiment with I'm going to start trying to make this one.
>
>Kizik Fiddleton
>Fennin Ro Wizard
>
